price: 36. Мре totielaki ye mopepe, ezalaki kotambola na mitindo naye bipai binso alingaki na mpete.
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
